content.description:
Stand start on underclings, get high feet, and mantle out the top. Try to avoid the tree!

The sit start from the big crimp is an open project.
content.location: Just past Ihuma, on your left

content.description: Start low and move up through crimps to top out.
content.location: To the right of High Water

content.description: Ascends the obvious compression-style prow. Sit start with right hand on good jug and left on crimp. Use heel hooks and good holds out right to top out directly above the prow feature.
content.location: Past the second set of overhangs the are part of the cliffline in the Vulture area, this short boulder will be on your left.

content.description: Start low matched on a slot jug and move up through pockety jugs to a big move before toping out.
content.location: When you enter the Vulture area, its the second string of overhangs. The overhangs off the cliffline, not the free standing boulder.

content.description:
This short boulder appears to have a triangle in the middle of it.

This is a very good line. Sit start matched on a crimpy, pockety break on the right side of the boulder. Makr your way left and up as you use underclings and slopers to topout at the apex of the boulder.

A stand start that starts with your left hand in the jug and right hand on the undercling that makes up the right side of the triangle can also be done at V2
content.location: Towards the back of the Vulture Area. When walking past the first freestanding boulder, head right uphill.

content.description: Start on the jugs of One Chossy Boi and move left to finish up Another Chossy Fella. Good movement, kinda sharp, a wee bit heinous
content.location: Start as per One Chossy Boi

content.description: Start on a right hand pocket and a left hand sidepull, make a big move straight up to a sloper and then another big move to a jug. topout
content.location: In between High Water and One Chossy Boy
